advancement.createcraftedbeginning.air_c: Pressurize Compressed Air using an Air Compressor

Attempt to re-pressurize High-Pressure Compressed Air
§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.createcraftedbeginning.airti: Craft any airtight component with Airtight Sheets to withstand immense pressures in Compressed Air systems

Ignite an epic explosion using Airtight Encased Pipes
§7(Hidden Advancement)

Fully seal an Airtight Encased Pipe with airtight sheets, and then reevaluate your life choices
§7(Hidden Advancement)
Initiate Compressed Air generation using the Airtight Intake Port
Operate an Airtight Intake Port at maximum intake rate
advancement.createcraftedbeginning.breez: Find a frosty new home for your Breeze friend
Pour slush into the Breeze Cooler to trigger your Breeze's Galling state

Flood the Breeze Cooler with lava—accidentally or intentionally
§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.createcraftedbeginning.compr:
Witness a copper fluid component being blown up by excessive pressure through a Spyglass
§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.createcraftedbeginning.gas_i: Process any item using the Gas Injection Chamber
advancement.createcraftedbeginning.ice_c: Make yourself an ice cream treat using slush
Create an ice cream with exotic flavors using a Spout
advancement.createcraftedbeginning.pneum: Place a Pneumatic Engine, then power it using Compressed Air from a Backtank
appliances.cinder_incineration_blower.wo: Side length of the cubic working range
createcraftedbeginning.gui.goggles.air_c: It appears that the Air Compressor has _inadequate_ output _storage capacity_.
It appears that no _Breeze Cooler_ is placed _beneath_ the Air Compressor.
It appears that the Air Compressor _lacks_ sufficient _Compressed Air_ input.
It appears that this %1$s is _not_ rotating with _enough_ _speed_.
createcraftedbeginning.gui.goggles.breez: It appears that the Breeze ate some _bad_ food.
It appears that the _Airtight Tank_ beneath the Breeze Chamber is _improperly_ sized.
It appears that no _Airtight Tank_ is placed _beneath_ the Breeze Chamber.
It appears that the Breeze is now _hungry_.
It appears that the fluid currently _stored_ is _invalid_.
It appears that _no coolant_ is currently _available_.
createcraftedbeginning.gui.goggles.intak: It appears that the _front face_ of the Airtight Intake Port is _obstructed_.
It appears that the _connection_ between the Airtight Intake Port and %1$s is _invalid_.
It appears that the Airtight Intake Port is _not_ connected to any _valid components_.
It appears that this %1$s is _not_ rotating with _enough_ _speed_.
It appears that the Airtight Intake Port is _waterlogged_.
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.air_compre: Pressurize Compressed Air using Air Compressors
The Air Compressor can further pressurize Compressed Air under specified conditions

Condition 1: 
A Breeze Cooler must be placed directly beneath the Air Compressor

Condition 2: 
The Air Compressor must maintain at least medium rotational speed

Condition 3: 
Inputting Compressed Air into one side will generate High-Pressure Compressed Aas at the opposite side
The §3Chilled§r and §bGalling§r states of the Breeze Cooler increase the pressurization rate, while the §8Riming§r state decreases it
It will simultaneously influence Stress consumption as well
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_e: Moving Compressed Air using Airtight Encased Pipes
Unlike regular Airtight Pipes, Airtight Encased Pipes can connect in any direction
Using an Airtight Sheet on an opening prevents gas from leaking through it
Placing a block against the opening also prevents gas leakage
The Wrench can then be used to remove the Airtight Sheet used for sealing

Warning!
Excessive openings combined with high rotational speeds trigger violent explosions
Airtight Engines can be placed on an Airtight Tank, which
Condensate can only be pumped out after placement of a Condensate Drain
The higher the level of the Airtight Drive Assembly, the faster the Condensate generation rate
The Stress of the Airtight Engine can be output through Cogwheels
With sufficient Compressed Air and space...
The minimal setup requires 3 Airtight Tanks
While supporting a maximum structure of 3x3x4
If supplied with Compressed Air, the Airtight Drive Assembly will remain passive state regardless of input quantity
If supplied with High Pressure Compressed Air, it will generate additional Stress
It will also continue to generate Condensate, and excessive accumulation of Condensate will limit the maximum level
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_i: Producing Compressed Air using Airtight Intake Ports
The Airtight Intake Port can continuously produce Compressed Air under specified conditions

Condition 1: 
The Airtight Intake Port must be directly attached to an Airtight Pump

Condition 2: 
The direction of the Airtight Pump must oppose the intake direction of the Airtight Intake Port

Condition 3: 
The front face of the Airtight Intake Port must remain unobstructed

Condition 4: 
The Airtight Intake Port must not be waterlogged

Condition 5: 
The Airtight Pump must maintain at least medium rotational speed
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_p: Moving Compressed Air using Airtight Pipes
Airtight Pipes cannot transport any fluids; they exclusively transport Compressed Air
Airtight Pipes cannot connect to any other adjacent pipe segments
Moving Compressed Air using Airtight Pumps
Airtight Pumps paired with Airtight Pipes can transport Compressed Air at high rotation speed
Similarly to Airtight Pipes, Airtight Pumps cannot transport fluids
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.airtight_t: Storing Compressed Air in Airtight Tanks
Airtight Tanks cannot store any fluids; they exclusively store Compressed Air
Airtight Tanks can be combined up to 3x3x4 to increase total capacity
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.andesite_c: Andesite Crate can store up to 128 identical items
However, contents cannot be added or taken manually
Andesite Crate drops itself and contents when broken
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.brass_crat: Brass Crate has twice the storage capacity of Andesite Crate
Items in the filter slot specify what to store
Thus preventing unnecessary items from entering
Brass Crate drops itself and contents when broken
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.breeze_coo: Breeze Coolers can act as coolants for the blocks directly above them
For this, the Breeze Cooler requires feeding with low-temperature items
With a Powder Snow Bucket, the Breeze Cooler can reach an even stronger level of coolness
The feeding process can be automated using Deployers, Mechanical Arms or Mechanical Pumps
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.cardboard_: Cardboard Crate temporarily stores only one stack of items
When storing different items, items within the crate will be destroyed
When storing identical items, any excess beyond the stack limit will be destroyed
Cardboard Crate drops only itself when broken
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.cinder_inc: Igniting Mobs using Cinder Incineration Blowers
Cinder Incineration Blower can damage and ignite nearby mobs when rotational force is applied
Use the value panel to configure its working range
Higher rotation speed shortens damage and ignition intervals
At highest RPM, it deals 2 damage and ignites for 2 seconds to mobs within range every half-second
However, Cinder Incineration Blower stops working when rotation speed is too slow
Display Working Range of Cinder Incineration Blowers
While wearing the Engineer's Goggles, using a Wrench toggles the working range visualization
Only one Cinder Incineration Blower's working range can be displayed at the same time
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.compressed: Moving Compressed Air using Copper Fluid Pipes
Transporting Compressed Air poses a greater hazard than handling ordinary fluids
Excessive pressure from high rotation speeds in Mechanical Pumps will result in explosions
Mechanical Pumps must maintain low rotation speeds when transporting Compressed Air
Excessive pressure within fluid pipelines will also result in explosions
Besides, Fluid Tanks can only store small amounts of Compressed Air
A large amounts of Compressed Air cause another explosion as well
Furthermore, Portable Fluid Interfaces cannot transport Compressed Air
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.empty_bree: Right-click a Breeze with the empty cooler to capture it
Breezes can also be collected from Spawners and Trial Spawners directly
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.gas_inject: Injecting Gas into Items using a Gas Injection Chamber
The Gas Injection Chamber can inject gas into items directly beneath it
Pipes can be used to supply it with gas
The input items can be placed on a Depot under the Gas Injection Chamber
Items on belts are also processed automatically
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.photo-stre: Generates Rotational Force using Photo-Stress Bearings
Photo-Stress Bearing can absorb direct sunlight to generate kinetic stress
Rotation speed is proportional to sky light level
Rotation speed maintains a minimum of 2 RPM even at sky light level 0
During rain or thunderstorms, the rotation speed is halved
Use the value panel to configure its rotation direction
In other dimensions, Photo-Stress Bearings will stop working
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.pneumatic_: Generates Rotational Force using Pneumatic Engines
Pneumatic Engine can absorb compressed air from Backtanks to generate kinetic stress
Backtanks must be placed directly below the Pneumatic Engine
Using a Wrench, the rotation direction can be toggled
Pneumatic Engine consumes 2 seconds worth of compressed air supply per second from the backtank
Pneumatic Engine stops working when compressed air is depleted
Pneumatic Engine stops working when the backtank is waterlogged
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.sturdy_cra: Sturdy Crate has four times the storage capacity of Andesite Crate
Items in the filter slot specify what to store
Sturdy Crate can't store Shulker Boxes, Toolboxes, or other Sturdy Crates
Sturdy Crate drops itself with contents stored when broken
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.tag.breeze: Components which help capturing Breezes and work like Coolants
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.tag.compre: Components which help replying and making use of Compressed Airs
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.tag.crates: Crates can only store identical items, but ignore stack limits
createcraftedbeginning.ponder.tag.kineti: Components which make use of Rotational Force
